titleStmt.title: A spiritual prospective glass Through which the rulers and people of England, may plainly see those things which concerns their peace. Being a manifestation from the Spirit of God, in love to all people. By one that desires the prosperity of truth, and the peace of the nation. W.Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

titleStmt.title: A spiritual prospective glass Through which the rulers and people of England, may plainly see those things which concerns their peace. Being a manifestation from the Spirit of God, in love to all people. By one that desires the prosperity of truth, and the peace of the nation. W.Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

notesStmt.note: W. Smith = William Smith. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
